title: Berkshire's Earnings Are Saturday. Watch Buybacks, Cash, and Its Apple Stake.
text: The company, led by Warren Buffett, had a record class A per-share earnings last quarter.

title: Amazon/Apple Earnings Previews: Amazon Is A Little More Favored Here Than Apple
text: Amazon is expecting to grow EPS in '24 and '25 by 31% and 22% given current estimates, with the stock trading at 40x and 33x times those estimates. AMZN's price to cash flow is 16x and price to free cash flow is 39x. AMZN's trailing twelve month (TTM) cash flow per share is $10.58 per share, while AMZN's TTM EPS per share is $4.68. For the all-important holiday quarter, consensus is looking for $2.38 in EPS and $127.5 billion in revenue for Apple, which would result in y-o-y growth of 7% and 9% respectively.

title: Apple Unveils New MacBook Pro Fresh Off Launch of Apple Intelligence
text: Apple's (AAPL) week of product announcements leading up its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings report continued on Wednesday with the launch of a new MacBook Pro powered by the company's M4 family of chips.

title: Apple lacking ‘killer AI use case' to drive iPhone demand - UBS
text: Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL, ETR:APC)'s flagship artificial intelligence (AI) launch has underwhelmed, leaving the technology giant in need of a “killer” use case to drive iPhone demand, UBS analysts say. Based on tracking of wait times for new iPhones, UBS said in a note that there had been “no notable uptick in demand” following the release of Apple Intelligence.

title: Two Warren Buffett Stocks Get Pounded, With Apple Earnings Due
text: This week marks a fire hose of earnings from several top Warren Buffett stock holdings. "Extraordinary business" Apple is on deck Thursday.

title: Apple's Q4 Earnings: Will Steady Services Offset Sluggish Mac Sales?
text: AAPL's fourth-quarter fiscal 2024 results are expected to reflect the negative impacts of a sluggish PC market, offset by steady growth in Services revenues.

title: Option Trades in AAPL and AMZN
text: Ahead of closely watched earnings reports for Apple (AAPL) and Amazon (AMZN), Kevin Hincks provides example options trading strategies in both of the big tech names. ======== Schwab Network ======== Empowering every investor and trader, every market day.

title: Apple Reports After The Close On 10/31 - Options Expire The Next Day
text: According to NextEarningsDate.com, the Apple next earnings date is projected to be 10/31 after the close, with earnings estimates of $1.60/share on $94.41 Billion of revenue.

title: What Lies in Store for Apple ETFs This Earnings Season?
text: Apple stock is hovering around a new high on improving demand for its latest iPhone 16.

title: Apple updates MacBook Pro laptops with new chips, more memory for AI
text: Apple on Wednesday launched new MacBook Pro laptops with updated M4 chips, in what is likely the company's last major hardware announcement of the year. The new MacBook Pros are equipped with Apple's latest chip, the M4.

title: Why Apple shareholders may want the Tim Cook era to come to a close
